segments.text: Come in , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , Mrs Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good morning . You are Mr . Sun , aren't you ? Take a seat , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've noticed from your resume that you majored in accounting at Peking University . Will you please tell me something about your related courses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the first academic year we learned Principles of Accounting , and in the following years we learned Cost Accounting , Commercial Accounting , Industrial Accounting , and Management Accounting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you taken Accounting for Decision-Making and Control ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we haven't taken such a course , but we have taken a more specialized course for decision making , by the name of Forecasting and Decision-Making .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: From your school report card , I can see you did well in every course . But our advertisement says we need an accountant with practical work experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I forgot to include my experience as an accountant in my resume . In fact , I took a part-time job as an accountant at the Atlantic Trading Company during my second and third school year . I worked three evenings a week there and I did quite well . Here is the recommendation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can speak English fluently but I wonder if you can deal with bookkeeping and accounting in English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . The professional English course is just English for Accounting . Moreover , as you know , the Atlantic Trading Company is a Sino-Australian joint venture . When I served part-time there , I became well acquainted with accounting operated in English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds fine . Why did you choose to apply to our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a relative working as a manager in your manufacturing department . Her name is Lilling . She told me a lot about your company and I became quite interested . I believe I can have a promising career with the development of this company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know something about the payment we give to our employees ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , can you tell me about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . As for an entry-level accountant , we pay ¥ 1,500 a month in the first half year . We have a grading system to evaluate your work . If you have made progress , we will certainly raise your salary . For beginners with a CPA certificate , they can earn at least ¥ 2 , 000 a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have passed the five courses required by the Chinese CPA Association , but the certificate won't come to hand until next month . How about that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you can show me your CPA certificate before we reach a decision by the end of July .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mrs Smith . It is really a pleasure talking with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The same for me . We'll keep in touch with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Good-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
